name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: A powerful laptop with the M1 Pro chip for high-performance computing, great for professionals in design, video editing, and programming.

name: Nike Air Max 270
description: Sporty and stylish, the Air Max 270 is designed for everyday comfort with a large air cushioning unit for impact protection.

name: Ray-Ban Wayfarer Sunglasses
description: Classic Ray-Ban Wayfarer sunglasses provide iconic style and superior UV protection, perfect for any outdoor activity.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: A flagship smartphone with a stunning display, powerful performance, and top-tier cameras for photography enthusiasts.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 running shoes provide unmatched comfort and energy return, perfect for long-distance runs.

name: Casio G-Shock GA2100
description: A rugged, durable digital watch designed for everyday wear, known for its shock resistance and iconic design.

name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
description: Featuring a ProMotion display, 5G connectivity, and the powerful A15 Bionic chip, the iPhone 13 Pro offers unmatched performance and camera capabilities.

name: The North Face Puffer Jacket
description: Stay warm and stylish in this insulated puffer jacket, designed to handle the coldest conditions with comfort and durability.

name: Beats Studio3 Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-canceling wireless headphones from Beats, designed for premium sound and comfort for all-day wear.

name: Levi's Men's Original Jeans
description: Classic Levi's jeans offering timeless style, durable construction, and a comfortable fit for everyday wear.

name: Sony Bravia 55-inch 4K TV
description: A 55-inch 4K HDR television with a stunning display, smart features, and immersive sound quality, perfect for home entertainment.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: A smart fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and stress management features for a healthier lifestyle.
